addr: 1925 West Olympic Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90006
title: KASCE Scholarship Awards Dinner
desc: The mission of KASCE (Korean American Society of Civil Engineers) is to promote, encourage and empower Korean American Civil Engineering professionals to advance professionally, compete effectively in business, advance civil engineering and contribute to the enhancement of our communities. One of the ways that KASCE would like to accomplish its mission is through encouraging Korean American students in Civil Engineering through scholarship, mentorship, internship and development programs.
